name: Caveborne
description: Cave-Borne is a beginner dev project for the LMOB Jam +25 that was made by 5 individuals who came together in 4 days to try create something together.  The following is our progress over the past few days and although some of us had never collaborated with others before we all learned and contributed a lot. I wish I could've better rationed out my time organizing but hey, no time for regrets. The game is still pretty decent, and can always be improved upon! ~lloydo
